channel.title: Need help witch character's
channel.description: So i need helm witch me server character's 1. I Download server from www.moparisthebest.com 2. Run it 3. Create account everything OK I use name: Server password: 123456 But here is problem.... I open me server folder and open folder characters There is me characters witch name "Server" But i see password dont! 123456 i see 2864be1f97ef738283c416f1618c4ec8 [ACCOUNT] character-username = Server character-password = 2864be1f97ef738283c416f1618c4ec8 i dont whana see it.... i whana seee [ACCOUNT] character-username = Server character-password = 123456 How i need do it? When all me server player's creade new account i whana see password not 2864be1f97ef738283c416f1618c4ec8 thet!!! so can help me?

item.title: Need help witch character's
item.dc:creator: @lt_rune_own lt rune own
item.description:
@lt_rune_own wrote:

So i still don’t know how do it!
I Can’t do thet??
Because when i ferst time download the server i see password now i can’t!
So if someone can help just sey where i can read or what i need do! plz[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 07, 2009, 06:06:54 am[/size][hr]::getpass doesn’t work

item.title: Need help witch character's
item.dc:creator: @lt_rune_own lt rune own
item.description:
@lt_rune_own wrote:

So i need helm witch me server character’s

  1. I Download server from www.moparisthebest.com
  2. Run it
  3. Create account everything OK
    I use name: Server password: 123456
    But here is problem…
    I open me server folder and open folder characters
    There is me characters witch name “Server” But i see password dont! 123456 i see 2864be1f97ef738283c416f1618c4ec8
    [ACCOUNT]
    character-username = Server
    character-password = 2864be1f97ef738283c416f1618c4ec8 i dont whana see it…
    i whana seee
    [ACCOUNT]
    character-username = Server
    character-password = 123456
    How i need do it?
    When all me server player’s creade new account i whana see password not 2864be1f97ef738283c416f1618c4ec8 thet!!!
    so can help me?
